title: Must See
text: So impressed with the World Trade Center Station. They have created such a wonderful spot to remember those whose lives were lost.

title: Beauty
text: Such a wonderful spot to visit. Lots of people around, but that's NYC! Everyone was so helpful and the hotel was very clean! Have to compliment the bartenders! They made great drinks and were so friendly!

title: Instagram spot
text: A must see spot on your tourist list. You and other instagrammers are available to start taking pictures and posing in this area. So pretty to not taking pictures!

title: Must See
text: A must see spot. It is breathtaking. I recommend finding a rooftop somehwerre to take in the full view of the city.

title: Date Night
text: Great hole in the wall spot with so much charm. The Menu is small but outstanding! Each cocktail is well worth its price. So delicious. A go to spot every time I visit!

title: Get the Brussels
text: Great atmosphere. Great margaritas. Small tacos. I ate three tacos with a side of brussel sprouts and was full. The tacos aren't enough to eat alone.

title: Beautiful
text: Mount Lycabettus can be seen all over Athens. It looks amazing from the Acropolis. Easy to see all over!

title: YOU MUST GO HERE
text: This was my FAVORITE spot in the city my entire trip. We sat outside and overlooked the city and the lit up Acropolis at night. It was absolutely magical!

title: Wine with a view
text: Great spot to enjoy an evening. Impeccable service. We enjoyed apps overlooking the city with a bottle of wine. Perfect spot to soak in the city!

title: So fun
text: Enjoy a stop on your trip here! Your 360 view is worth the walk to the top! Mountains, water, and so much green space!

title: Opa!
text: Dance on the table and smash plates. This cute spot is well worth the stop. We worked with the chef and made three different dishes to eat ourselves. It was incredible!

title: Incredible!
text: A must see spot in Greece. Rich in history and just outstanding to see in real life. Worth the walk!

title: Best BBQ. MUST GO
text: In shock by how amazing the BBQ is here. We had a 4 course meal and several bottles of wine and the quality of food was outstanding! We spent 3 hours just enjoying out company and feasting. Incredible different types of BBQ. You have to go!

title: Free Entry during certain hours
text: I recommend going when it is free. There isn't a lot to see that you can't see outside of the gate. They have specific times when you can get in for free.

title: A great stop on your trip
text: Get your shopping fix in. From typical venders to little local shops get all the souvenirs you need.

title: You have to go
text: This is a must see part of Athens. Amazing view from the top and dripping in rich history! It is incredible how amazing it is!

title: Everything you need to know about the acropolis
text: Everything you need to know about the acropolis. The museum is built on an ancient city that you can see on the glass floors! Amazing information inside!

title: Must see
text: Wow! This is a must see spot in Athens. I highly recommend going in November to beat all of the crowds! Or go very early in the morning.

title: Instagram Trip
text: Malibu wines was on a pretty plot of land but seemed only useful for Instagram opportunities. Every corner was based on where to take pictures. Although beautiful and cool to be close to a giraffe and zebra, it wasn't as much fun as expected. The wine was ok.

title: ATV Tour
text: Outstanding tour guides. Delectable wine. Learned so much about the wine process. The estate is big so seeing it on an ATV was perfect. Wine drinking pit stops along the way! Could have spent all day here. Wish I could have!

title: WOW incredible
text: The best food we ate the entire trip! Very relaxing atmosphere. $20 corkage fee if you bring your own wine onto the train. 3 course meal. Every course better than the last! Great date spot. Loved looking around the train and seeing the vineyards.
place: Napa Valley Wine Train with Gourmet Dinner

title: A must See
text: Wonderful views of the Redwood Forest. Be mindful of parking and reserving parking. Expect to spend a large amount of time here

title: Great Wharf
text: So much to do, see, and eat. Amazing view of the water and of the crazy hills and rows of houses! Could spend half the day here!

title: A San Fran staple
text: If you dont go over the Golden Gate Bridge did you even go to San Francisco? I suggest listening to the full house theme song while crossing over it!

title: A must see
text: You have to come here to see a perfect view of the Golden Gate Bridge. So many active people around. Clean beach. Wonderful views

title: Prohibition Theme
text: Prohibition themed bar. Great cocktails. Places to talk upstairs and downstairs. Good DJ. Get crowed around 10:30pm

title: Amazing
text: After the 17 mile drive we stopped for dinner. Outdoor firepits, blanket. wine, and delicious food. Watched people play golf while chatting. Perfect evening. Felt like I was at home.. if home was on a golf course.

title: A must
text: We rented a convertible and had the time of our lives driving through this area. Lots of places to stop and take pictures! Great date idea.

title: So beautiful
text: We rented a convertible and had the time of our lives driving through this area. Lots of places to stop and take pictures!

title: Not as nice as expected
text: I heard only great things about the Fisherman's Wharf, but it didn't meet expectations. It looked like it might have been big 20 years ago. Pay for parking. Spend five minutes walking to the end and pass either tourist shops or whale watching excursions. Not worth it.

title: Surf Watch
text: We enjoyed watching the surfers while on the beach. The hotel Surfrider has an amazing rooftop bar.. only for people staying there. Heads up

title: Camping
text: Camped here one night. Wish we could have camped longer. Very clean. Everyone was very respectful. Beautiful views to wake up to. Loved it!

title: Camper
text: We camped here one night. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Felt like we were sleeping in a park more than sleeping at a campsite. Showers don't turn on until 7:00AM which was inconvient.

title: VIP only
text: So there is a VIP Nobu and an everyday person Nobu. After not being allowed into the members only Nobu we went to the other Nobu. It was a 2 hour wait so we got a drink at the bar and left. It was a nice place overlooking the ocean.

title: Fun for all
text: Date night, coffee run, beer spot, oh yeah and dogs can play too!! This place is outstanding. Can get very busy but the RUFFeree's keep the dogs all friendly. Membership is in my future so I can be a regular!

title: Not as good as expected
text: My friends are regulars here and we finally went. I knew going in that Mezza was a bit pricey and was expecting the prices. The atmosphere was lovely and bigger than what it looks like from the outside. The menu items all sounded delicious. We enjoyed good wine and several small appetizers. I split two meals with a friend and both were enjoyable but not outstanding. I just expected more from them. Overall it was good but I don't think I'd choose to go back.

title: Ice Cream Pit Stop
text: Ice cream, fudge, and everything sweet! I could have eaten everything in the store! Nice service and delicious treats!

title: Cold and Fun
text: The water may be cold but Sliding Rock was a blast! It was just as fun watching people going down the rock as it was to go myself. No line early in the morning!

title: Beautiful
text: Wonderful stop along the drive through Pisgah! You are able to get fairly close to the falls! Great picture opportunities.

title: Ice Cream Pit Stop
text: Way to hot to not get ice cream! Black raspberry chip to cool down after fishing. A much needed delicious treat!

title: Morning Fishing
text: Loved spending my morning fishing with DRO! Caught SO many fish! The tour guide was outstanding! Even recommended a good place for lunch! 100% recommend!

title: Beautiful
text: Tons of waterfalls and easy, moderate, and hard hikes. Tons of places to pull over and see an amazing view!

title: AMAZING spot
text: This place is insanely awesome! Food - great. Beer - great. Atmosphere - great. Outdoor area - great. Tours - great. Legit, this place is amazing. Outside is a small amphitheater, a playground for kids, an organic garden, a walking trail, rocking chairs, and tons of seating. I wish I could be a regular here!
place: Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. Tours & Tastings

title: Fun Spot
text: Great spot for the night. Enjoyed a few beers and hung out! Different from all the other breweries and had good beers

title: Poor Waitress
text: Planned on having dinner here, but the waitress wasn't very good so we got appetizers and left. She took a very long time to serve our table then when we asked questions on the menu she would say "I don't know." What rye whiskeys do you have? What is the table side magic it says on the menu? What is this ingredient in the drink? Every answer was "I don't know." What she did know what that tupelo honey is made in North America... which isn't entirely correct about tupelo honey. When we ordered the Brussels sprouts she said "are you sure?" After we ate we left. I wouldn't go back.

title: BEST BAR IN ASH
text: Hands down this was the best bar we went to in all of Asheville! It is tough to find and I think that it keeps out the riff raff. The bartenders actually know how to make drinks. It is impressive to watch them create outstanding cocktails. Don't know what to order? They are well versed in mixology and can make something based on what you will like. It is a little bit higher priced, but well worth it. The atmosphere is a dimly lit whiskey bar. Live band with cello playing. Friendly staff. Could have stayed here all night.

title: Expect a line
text: Stood in line Sunday morning for over 30 minutes to order only to find out it would take 45 minutes to get the food. So we got coffee and left. Everything looked amazing. If only we had more time!

title: Cornhole and Brews
text: We kept passing Hillman on our way into the city and finally stopped by for a beer. Ended up staying way longer having fun playing cornhole and listening to music. Good drinks!

title: Amazing atmosphere
text: The lights caught our eye and we had to go in. Full far and also serves Asian snacks. Amazing live band! Totally different than many of the other bars around Asheville. Cool places to sit and hang!

title: Coffee and a Smoothie
text: Stopped by for a quick drink. It was a very relaxing atmosphere. The drinks were amazing! Had a wonderful outdoor seating area away from the road in a nice backyard. Polite staff. I would go back!

title: Lots of Girls
text: I think I'm starting to get too old for these kind of places. My bachelorette crew got in for free with VIP bottle service. There were probably 70 girls to every guy inside the club. Bottle service for most tables. Everyone dancing with the strobe lights and fog machine. Hard to hear.

title: Amazing
text: The food was to die for! Good music, authentic food, and great service. The drinks were delightful. So many options to choose from!

title: Amazing stay
text: I normally an Airbnb person but this was outstanding! Very clean room and lobby. Huge pool and outside lounge area. Almost 4 stars because it is near impossible to get a lounge chair for the pool. But the location is perfect and right on the beach!

title: Beautiful view
text: Wonderful spot to stop and relax. Greenery right by the water. Great spot to people watch! Beautiful spot

title: A must see
text: South Beach is a must see spot in Miami. See what the city has to offer! Amazing food, clean beach, shopping, and people watching!

title: Drag Brunch!
text: Hands down the best part of my trip to Miami! Bottomless mimosas, amazing food, and an amazing show! You need to go!!

title: Must see
text: A must see spot on your Key Largo trip. Great visibility for diving or snorkeling. Reef and fish all around!

title: Great Viability
text: Had an amazing time diving here! Really good viability and a variety of colors in the reef. Lots to look at and many different types of fish.
place: John Pennekamp Coral Reef State Park

title: Dive here
text: Amazing statue to see while diving or snorkeling. Lots to look at around the statue and great viability!

title: Dinner with Family
text: Great spot for dinner! Eat like a true south Floridian here! Great atmosphere and service. Fresh fish to die for!
